text: Toto emiesi imbeli wa Nyasaye ni ekhumi nachibili mushitabu shia Nyasaye. Inyanga yayalonga likulu nende eshialo, mumiesi echo khulimwo nende chine echioluyali muno, eyo niyo idini ili habwene, kho mulakholamwo obubii tawe, ne lwane nende abatsokaasi shinga abo boosi balwananga ninanyu, ne manye mbu Nyasaye ali halala nende balia abamuria
